attributes.action: introduce legislation to remove the protection from prosecution which members of the House of Lords and the House of Commons seem to have cossetted themselves with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have elected MPs committing theft and fraud; we have unelected members of the House of Lords being found - by their peers - guilty of accepting bribes and 'graft' yet NOT ONE SINGLE MEMBER OF EITHER HOUSE has been prosecuted.  This immoral self protection they have written for themselves must be broken down.  This is not a democracy if the people who govern can simply write themselves to be outside of the laws which apply to the rest of the population, when that population is paying for what the cossetted criminals are doing!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
